alert.note: Alert for Hooker; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 23 at 4:21AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN HOOKER...NORTHERN LINCOLN...LOGAN...MCPHERSON AND SOUTHWESTERN THOMAS COUNTIES THROUGH 500 AM CDT/400 AM MDT/... At 421 AM CDT/321 AM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Tryon to 16 miles west of Ringgold to 6 miles north of Sutherland. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Stapleton, Tryon, Gandy, Ringgold, Highway 83 crossing The Dismal River, Shanklin Bluff, Brown Lake, Coker, and Tarboz Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 193 and 238. Highway 97 between mile markers 3 and 43. Highway 83 between mile markers 92 and 138. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
